issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Enable more clippy lints
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10828](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10828). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
clippy::redundant_field_names,
 clippy::redundant_static_lifetimes,
 clippy::redundant_pattern_matching,
 clippy::redundant_closure,
